dialog: YTS.MX Official YIFY movies site: YTS.MX Kaijyu Theatre Presents Regular Size Monsters Series Shinya Tsukamoto's Film Tomoroh Taguchi in TETSUO  THE IRON MAN Hello.
I've felt very strange since the hitandrun accident.
This is too much to take.
How the hell did this happen to me?
I told you... I don't scare easily.
Okay, you like what you see?
I can't show you any more.
I'm being punished. That must be it.
I told you I could take it.
You want a taste of my sewage pipe?
How did you make it here?
There's a piece of metal stuck in your brain.
I can't believe you're still alive!
Soon even your brain will turn into metal.
Let me show you something wonderful.
You see all this rust on my body?
My first metal implant was already rusty...
before my cells began to assimilate it.
But your shaver was stainless steel!
Damn, you want to rust yourself to death?
We can mutate the whole world into metal.
We can rust the world into the dust of the universe.
Our love can destroy this whole fucking world.

Salaryman: Tomorah Taguchi Girlfriend: Kai Fujiwara Woman in Glasses: Nobo Kanaoka Fetishist: Shinya Tsukamoto Doctor: Naomasa Musaka Tramp: Renji Ishibashi Script / Art Direction / Lighting Editor / Special Effects: Shinya Tsukamoto Assistant Director / Wardrobe: Kai Fujiwara Photography: Shinya Tsukamoto and Kai Fujiwara Music: Chu Ishikawa Music Operator: Mitsuhiro Ozaki Insert Music: Akio Okusawa Recording: Asahi Sound Studio Production Assistants: Nobu Kanaoka, Hiroyuki Kobato, Tomoko Ishigami, Tomoko Kodaka Translation: Kiyo Joo & Tony Rayns A Kaijyu Theatre Production With the cooperation of: japan Home Video / K2 Spirit / S.E.N.
